website_summaries.verdict: Extra coated and capable of staying strong over the course of extended travel.
pros: We love the extra touches, including a built-in suit bag as well as a no-wobble design
Professionals including pilots and international business travelers appreciate the TSA-friendly design
Features USB compatibility and lots of extra space
cons: Doesn't offer much in the way of  technological features beyond the USB port

website_summaries.verdict: This 4-wheel spinner is packed with features and built to last. Popular choice for pilots and flight attendants.
pros: nylon bag rolls smoothly on 4 spinner wheels
Comes with triple-stop extension handle and leather grips
Exterior USB port makes it easy to power up
Interior features include wet pocket and side mesh compartments
cons: Some owners warn that the wheels and top handle make it bigger than advertised

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description, this is not a carry-on
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue is that this suitcase is advertised as a 21” carry-on and the Amazon description states “This Carry-On bag has been sizer bin tested to accommodate overhead bin space on most major US airlines” which is misleading and false. The suitcase is actually 23.5”x14.5”x9.5” and can be confirmed on TravelPro’s website. Most major airlines restrict carry-on’s to 22”x14”x9” so I have needed to check-in my bag on numerous occasions (Alaska Airlines).
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: A great upgrade from my old TravelPro that lasted over 16 ...
customer_reviews.text: A great upgrade from my old TravelPro that lasted over 16 years and 1.5 million miles (and still works, albeit looking really worn). So far I used the new TravelPro Crew 11 on a single trip. It is easy to roll in the airport, hotel, in the plane, and outside. Virtually effortless. What's really good is that my suit arrived almost without wrinkles after a 3.5 hour flight and a 40 min Uber ride. The suitcase is very lightweight. It easily fits overhead (on American Airlines). It looks good as well. Haven't used the USB feature yet, but it's pretty cool to have it. A great purchase and a great job, TravelPro!
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Sevounts

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful if full time traveler
customer_reviews.text: Works for mediocre travel. I am cabin crew and I have replaced the wheel once before and now last week another fell off. And now at 6am in the morning another just fell off as well. Contacted travelpro they gave me a one time replacement the first time this happened last year, now its approx $22 to get another with shipping. Not worth it. Lifetime warranty is NOT on this model for wheels. Buy Tumi or Briggs and Riley, an investment that's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NevHarvs

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Sturdy. The side charging pocket is not as useful as it is made out to be. It is very useful for holding a bottle of water or a bottled soft drink when moving thru the airport. NO issues with the wheel or fitting in normal overhead bins. Some reports of the narrow opening but I have no issues putting a suit in the bag. I've on about 20 flights so far. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K Alderman

customer_reviews.title: We've used it only twice and it's now useless to me
customer_reviews.text: The strap on the top of the bag came off in my hands. We've used it only twice and it's now useless to me. Bought it 5 months ago and can't return it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: john h

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! Faulty zipper!
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is garbage. After one use, the zipper on the front pocket comes off track. It was used for one trip, but it is now outside the return window, so I am stuck with a crap product. Do not buy this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie

customer_reviews.title: The Crew 11 has better layout than the Crew 9
customer_reviews.text: The Crew 11 has better layout than the Crew 9. Sleek, durable, and professional. The power pack sleeve allows me to charge three items at once because I purchased a RAVPower 26800 that fits in the sleeve and has awesome storage capacity. My biggest pet peeve at airport is finding power receptacles- no more!
customer_reviews.author: George C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Carry On for International/business travelers.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have a Travel Pro carry on. Before I tried many brands and always had issues with the wheels. I never liked the design of the Travel pro products but recently I noted that they changed the design and there are beautiful lines. The wheel system is outstanding no matter the type of floor. I bought two Travel pro Crew 21 and just ordered one a little bigger (Crew 11 25").
customer_reviews.author: Juangram

customer_reviews.title: Am disappointed in this design
customer_reviews.text: Handles take up a lot of interior room. Am disappointed in this design.
customer_reviews.author: STP

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband who is a pilot. He loves the size of this piece and always appreciates the high quality of travelpro. He has been using Travelpro for many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L Frost

customer_reviews.title: Really like the design and quality of this Carry-On
customer_reviews.text: Well designed carry-on roller bag. Roll's on the magnetically steered wheels like butter. Having an included "suit bag" properly sized for this luggage is a huge plus, too. This carry-on roller costs a little bit more than some of the other models out there but isn't in the absurdly high cost category of some of the other "luxury" models. Particularly liked that the telescopic handle feels sturdy and doesn't wobble around. Zippers are of high quality. Got mine in the dark brown color and it looks sharp. Travelpro makes some even higher quality bags but those are designed more for flight crews who spent their whole careers traveling. This one is good enough for most casual to moderate travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Audiophile Headcase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As always a great bag. Lightweight, well-designed and seems to be compatible with carry-on requirements for most airlines.
customer_reviews.author: Corellian

customer_reviews.title: Get this before it’s gone.....
customer_reviews.text: It’s better than the new version. I have used this as well as the Crew 11 international Carry-On Spinner. I can travel with two weeks worth of clothes in this carry-on. (It’s all in the weight and type of fabric you choose as well as mixing and matching). This bag is sturdy. It comes with lots of room and useful features. The wheels roll smoothly and you can walk along side of this bag and guide it with one finger in most cases. When you need 2 bags, I recommend checking this one and carrying on the Crew 11 International Carry-On Spinner. They are phasing this out for a new version and this one is made with better materials.
customer_reviews.author: Gardengal

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively accommodating
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a frequent flyer (pilot) and so far so good. According to him, although it looks small, it fits a week’s worth of business clothes, pjs, and toiletries because he also used those space saver packing cubes. It handles well, feels sturdy, and has lots of compartments for organization. He pairs this with the matching Travelpro Crew 11 duffel bag. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Millet

customer_reviews.title: so far a good bag
customer_reviews.text: Packs easily, rolls nicely, zippers smooth. But be careful, on a recent long trip I packed it pretty full. I was embarrassed when it wouldn’t fit in the overhead bin on Delta/Skywest’s Embraer E-175. Unlike Alaska, who checks carryons on the tarmac when you fly regional planes (like the Bombardier Q 400), Delta does not. So until a nice flight attendant bailed me out I was “that guy” with a line of people waiting for me so they could get to their seats. Just be aware you can pack this bag to the point it will not fit into some overhead bins.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this luggage set in three sizes (29", 25", 21") for a family trip oversees. I was worried about getting "cheap" luggage as we have a Briggs and Riley set that's starting to feel it's age (20+ years); but I shouldn't have been. This set worked perfectly and I can tell this set will last for many years and trips to come! Plus, the three bags nest comfortably inside each other, making it take up less storage space when stored between trips. The smallest bag can also be used as a carry on, if wanted. Two thumbs up, way up!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Indigo
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a very worn and well-traveled rollerboard that was borderline too large for current size limitations. I was looking for a non-black lightweight spinner with multiple exterior pockets. The indigo color really appealed to me, so that's pretty much why I bought it. I haven't used the suiter, I think it's just as easy to use dry cleaner bags over hangers, they can be thrown out and they don't take up as much space as a suiter.
customer_reviews.author: MRK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome spinner roller bag...  it works awesome on hard surfaces, and the double wheel design on each corner makes it roll bette
customer_reviews.text: Awesome spinner roller bag... it works awesome on hard surfaces, and the double wheel design on each corner makes it roll better on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Derek K.

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 stars but... it is not really Mahogany Brown. It is "mauve"
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic. I travel almost every week for business. Wheels glide smoothly, handle telescopes beautifully, etc. I bought mahogany brown because I wanted to distinguish easily from all the black bags on gate check bags jetway retrieval. The mahogany brown though is a weird color, many folks have asked me if it is mauve. It is definitely a purplish brown which is a very odd color indeed. Don't know if I got an odd batch of fabric or what but it IS weird. Literally, the only thing holding this bag back from a perfect 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: /./.a

customer_reviews.title: A lot of hardware but the interior is too small
customer_reviews.text: The interior of this suitcase is much smaller than I expected -- most of its size is taken up by equipment (spinners, etc.). Might work ok for an overnight trip but for me, there is so much less space in it than in comparable carry-ons that it was disappointing. It almost looked silly when we opened it. I also don't like TravelPro's new style for the "expandable" feature -- it only expands on one side of the suitcase, rather than across the entire suitcase. Aside from dramatically cutting down on the interior size of the suitcase when it is expanded, that also makes it difficult to pack if you intend to make use of the expanded portion.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: They say there's a reason that so many flight crew members carry Travelpro - and that reason is QUALITY! I could not be more impressed. My previous carry-on, a rolling suiter, is now just slightly too large to fit in the overhead bins of smaller planes. It was an Atlantic which, as I understand, was Travelpro's "civilian" luggage line - so I was sorry to have to replace it: After 17 years of service it still looks - and functions - as good as new! I expect this new bag to serve as well for at least that long.
customer_reviews.author: kerbe

customer_reviews.title: After 3 uses, back panels have torn off
customer_reviews.text: I got a Travelpro because I thought they were supposed to be the most rugged brand out there (used by flight attendants.) After 3 uses (totally normal carry-on use!) the leather back panels have come off. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Tinder

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get the luggage for my husband but the handle is broken and will not expand all the way making his first business trip difficult and uncomfortable. He also could not get the phone charger to work. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good glide, lightweight, carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Used and abused this bag for the last 2.5 years. Work as an airline pilot, so 3-4 days a week every week this bag is getting pushed around. One of the wheels finally seized up last week. I ordered a new set of wheels directly from travel pro, they shipped out quick, and the bag is now as good as new. Remarkably good glide, and tracks a very straight line, bag feels like it’s walking itself sometimes. Can easily stack a second smaller back on the extendable handle and it stays upright and balanced. By far the best carryon bag out there.
customer_reviews.author: paul brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, well designed and made
customer_reviews.text: Well configured for keeping items from wrinkling. I like to he traditional roll aboard rather than swivel since you get more room (+1-1.5 interior). This let's you pack coats and shirts with out over folding. I can live two weeks international travel with this bag (ok I did use hotel laundry at one point). But I can easily pack a couple slacks, 3-4 dress shirts, and a sport coat in the hanging section with plenty of space for the rest in the main section.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: USB port....no power bank and mostly useless for that.....if that’s what you like about it.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband, mostly for the USB port to charge his devices while traveling. This is basically not functional because you have to add your own power bank....there is a pocket to add that next to the USB. If that’s the intention you could connect your device to your own power bank another way, and avoid the suitcase. I would return it but he likes the quality and spinning wheels, the garment bag is cheaply made. Good enough for the price but the frills are unimpressive.
customer_reviews.author: Srichardson

customer_reviews.title: Really like the wheels which tend to go straight
customer_reviews.text: The wheels have a magnetic action that keeps them all pointing in the same direction so the luggage rolls in a straight path. Overall very pleased with it and although the quality is probably a bit lower than the Elite model I don't travel that much. Had a two wheel carry-on for many years and this one is easier on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D

customer_reviews.title: TravelPro for Life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Crew 11 for my wife a few years ago after doing a bunch of research between it and the Away suitcase. The biggest draw for us was that the material is more durable and not being a hard shell it's much less prone to marks and scratches. It has endured numerous international trips and we don't travel without it now. Loved it so much that I just bought another one in the blue and brown. The brown, faux-leather accents are nice. My wife likes the color better than her all-black one so looks like I'm getting her hand-me-downs!
customer_reviews.author: Jdeng27

customer_reviews.title: Rolls like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Rolls like a dream! Love the USB on the back of the luggage, where you can charge your phone, or tablet. It doesn't come with the charging bank, as you will need to purchase one separately. It has three main storage spaces on this bag. The side one is where you put the charging bank. There is an outer most zipper could hold a slim computer or lighter/smaller items. Excellent wheels, solid construction!
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Fair value with above average construction.
customer_reviews.text: As a charter pilot, I need to pack for any combination of climates for a fourteen day duty cycle. I am limited to a back pack which is full of "emergency stores" and flight gear as well as the roll around. The Travelpro Crew contains all changes of clothes including two spare uniform shirts and slacks. Its size is optimum for crew compartment storage but I was disappointed that the girth or width of the bag tapers down towards the handle end. It actually carries less than tge bag I just retired. I like the four wheels which makes this very easy to navigate with in airports and FBOs.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Capani

customer_reviews.title: Strong and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: A little embarrassed at how much time I spent researching luggage but when you spend a significant amount of your life on the road, it literally pays to have high quality luggage that won't fall apart in the worst possible time. I've taken a few long haul trips with this bag and haven't had an issue. Consumer reports give this bag high remarks and so far they are spot on. Lightweight, strong zippers, well constructed. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Looks small but is great for 4-day business trip
customer_reviews.text: It seems a little on the small side, but very tall husband fit dress shoes and all business and casual clothes in it for a 4 day business trip. We like the durability and this is his first "spinner" wheeled bag and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Momooshka

customer_reviews.title: Good carry one
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on work and personal travel and it has held up well. It's a pretty low profile design so no problems with overhead space. The usb option is nice but I haven't used it yet. The quality of the materials seems good, so I don't expect many issues after some more use. The spinner works great over a variety of surfaces and no issues with the handle yet. 4 stars for the price because it seems like there are comparable ones for cheaper. Maybe this one will last longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Whitten

customer_reviews.title: So smooth
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on this thing are perfectly smooth and it really works great for travel. I've been on 3 trips so far with this, and it's fit in the overhead on every flight. The USB port works pretty well, although it's a bit annoying that there's no zipper on the back side to hide the cord when it's not in use, so you have to unplug and usually stuff it in the same side pocket where your power bank is stored. The suiter works great for me, too (size 44 shoulders)!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I found this a little cheaper on another luggage website but their customer service & shipping terms were atrocious so I ended up buying through Amazon. We already had a Travelpro carry-on and bought this one to join the pack. Quality is very good so far. The durability of the handle was a key selling feature as most other carry-on's have slender and fragile handles. When you pack a briefcase or other bag on top of this suitcase you really need to have a solid handle to take the weight.
customer_reviews.author: ABgeer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, fits a large amount of items in a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, fits a large amount of items in a small space and seems quite durable. My travel is primarily domestic and the bag fits well with room to spare in the overhead. Update: Changing to 4 stars, while nice and high quality - when fully loaded, this thing is front heavy and can be a pain to lug around an airport. It's not too bad, but not idea for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: The best suitcase ever
customer_reviews.text: I travel all the time. Like all the time - my bag is never unpacked and I take 1-2 flights per week both domestic and international. I've tried every brand out there, and this is the best. It has everything you need, looks good, and rolls like a dream. There are people out there who need their Tumi (looking at you fellow consultants), but this is the best bag and company on the market. I blew through three other bags (each in less than a year) before I switched to TravelPro and my first bag lasted 4 years before a family member stole it, and my new bag is as good as the old.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, super smooth and appears to be up to the task for sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. Fits great in oversize bins, easy to get back out, lite to carry and almost too smooth on it's wheels. If it's on even the slightest include and you take your hand off, it will roll away from you if your not paying attention. Note that the charging port does require a battery pack that is not included in the purchase. I had one already and it fits into the side pocket with no problem. It's really great for one or two day business trips.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels out of alignment
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are not aligned and therefore the case veers left/ right if not firmly controlled, negating the promised ease of rolling. This veering occurred on my first use of the loaded case and I was out of the country when the return window closed so haven't figure out how to get it returned/ refunded. All other features are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer, Coach, Leader

customer_reviews.title: Glides so smooth, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels a lot for conferences international & domestic US. I bought him this one and smaller version with charging pod. They both still look great after a year and sooo easy to roll no matter the train/bus station or airport conditions. Keeps his shirts neat and easy to spot on carousel.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Bishard

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A great pice of luggage. Works as described, leaving me to believe that air crews do buy this first. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Svengali

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality / Price
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are very pleased with these roll ons. Dimensions are accurate. They arrived fast and theres ample room while still meeting domestic carry on requirements. The only thing stopping a fifth star is the telescoping handle is a bit flimsy when fully extended and 1 of the 2 we ordered doesn't like to stay locked into place when fully extended. A very solid choice in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Usability
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of "wheelie" bags in my life time but this one is truly superior. The ease of wheeling it beside you versus pulling it behind is a real treat. I have many of the accompanying pieces and they all integrate nicely for a much easier traveling experience than I have had in the past. I highly recommend Travelpro luggage, especially the Crew Style. You will be very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Fred A. McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Small inside but fits the overhead bin
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time. I had to replace my 20-year-old Travelpro roll-on because of rips and zipper issues. The old Travelpro was larger inside, good for a few days of packing. The new one is only good for overnight, especially if you fold up a suit in the included bag and gently make it fit inside the case. But it fits the overhead bin on the plane very well.
customer_reviews.author: KenS

customer_reviews.title: Overall we were really happy with them
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the wheels make it longer than 21 inches, but I recently used it on a trip through Ireland and we rented a car and stayed at several hotels, some didn't have elevators; these suitcases fit well with most car options and they were light enough, even packed full, to carry by ourselves upstairs. We didn't carry on, so not sure about if they fit in the overhead, but they held up well being checked. Overall we were really happy with them, we'll see how they hold up to future travel!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fits in the overhead, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Much better than those plastic shell types that get broken. So far so good. Like the outside pocket and handle but have not taken advantage of the charger option. It has a slot for my name and address, should it get lost. Recommend putting a ribbon or some such on it to be sure no one else takes it by mistake at the TSA belt.
customer_reviews.author: JohnQ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carry-on
customer_reviews.text: This case is better than I had hoped for. It rolls very well track straight and lets me zip through the airport much better than my two wheeled carry-on. It’s the same brand that flight staff uses so I trusted it more than other brands that were out there. The service warranty is awesome they will ship you parts if you need it though I have yet to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Good product, zero customer support
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned, Travelpro doesn't care much about their customers, it seems. Also, don't bother mailing back your warranty card for a "free travel lock". They will not send it. Way to appreciate your paying customers, eh??
customer_reviews.author: Drew B

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this new version
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Travelpro Crew carry-on for a long time. I wanted the new model with four wheels and lighter weight material. I am very happy with this new version.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, yet large enough with great maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for some time nw, taking it to China, Japan and several times to Europe. It has and continues to work really well. Maneuverability was key in China and Japan when hustling through the train stations. Also is great size for trips up to 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: ff

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my first Travelpro but it is first one with spinner wheels. I took it on a recent trip by plane. It fit in all the overhead storage compartments, maneuvered easily through all the airports, and was roomy enough for everything I wanted to pack. Good quality and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Y. F. Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight and a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these. I use mine almost weekly and it's held up fantastically traveling across airports, city streets and tossed in the "back of the plane" when I can't get overhead. It's why you see so many airline staff with these products. Beats the cheaper ones by far and much less than the expensive brands like Tumi.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great wheels which stay aligned no matter your direction
customer_reviews.text: Great wheels which stay aligned no matter your direction. The media pocket is kind of useless but I'll use it for something else or maybe a small battery pack. Bag size is pretty standard for a carryon. No problem for domestic flights. Construction seems pretty solid, which is to be expected from Travelpro. Great handle.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: A very good bag. Strong but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: A very good bag. Strong but lightweight. Love the way the spinner wheels all track consistently on pretty much any surface. A little bit smaller interior than I anticipated due to spinner wheel mounts and the telescoping handle. The zippered expansion applies only to the bottom portion of the back (toward the wheels, so that the bag doesn't become top-heavy and more likely to tip over). A few interior pockets that I might never use, but others might find them very handy. I bought the indigo one both because it's a nice color and because it makes it readily identifiable on a baggage carousel.
customer_reviews.author: Mel DeSart

customer_reviews.title: Travel like the pros!
customer_reviews.text: I travel 100% for work and really wanted to invest in a quality carry on. After a ton of research I settled on this bag and couldn't be happier after a couple months of use. This thing glides effortlessly even if the terrain isn't perfect. We'll see how it holds up, but my initial impression is all positive.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. LaMarre

customer_reviews.title: Superb suitcase, battery compartment is shallow for large bricks.
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Didnt think I needed the 4 wheel design over a 2 wheel, but it is fantastic. Note, the battery compartment is a little shallow for larger capacity bricks and the built in USB plug stands straight out. I ordered a 90 degree pig tail to hopefully fix the overly tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a carryon bag to replace an older one. After reading many reviews I decided to give the Travelpro Crew 11 a try. I thought it was a little small inside, however I was able to pack more things inside than I expected. The bad: On my first and only trip one of the wheels sheared completely off. For a product that has a lifetime warranty I thought it would be more durable. Maybe this was just the one bad bag out of the bunch or it's a sign of poor workmanship or materials. Either way, I will not purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller carry-on and this seems to do the trick. Have traveled three or four times on two day trips and was able to fit everything nicely and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: scoope02

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage at great value
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage at great value. i was able to manage 2 bags with one hand. Wheels roll very easily in every direction. the inside is lined very well and compartments are very practical. I also bought the platinum. i can tell the difference in the quality and worth the extra money. Although if you're on a budget, this is excellent for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nononsense

customer_reviews.title: Love Travelpro! This is a great suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Love Travelpro! This is a great suitcase. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the interior space is smaller than I had hoped and they quit putting the extra bag clip by the handle. Putting a bag over the extender makes it very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: CO Girl

customer_reviews.title: great small bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for short trips. It works very well and it's amazing how much can fit inside. It rolls very easily and is light weight. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: STL Kid

customer_reviews.title: NICE BAG!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carry-on, especially for someone who wants the option to pull with four wheels. Travelpro makes quality gear, and this one won't disappoint. Great new features with the USB port and larger toiletry compartment. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Second Order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a granddaughter's high school graduation. I liked my set, so I though she would like the same. As far as I know it was a hit. Yay, for the grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: Archiva

customer_reviews.title: I have used it twice and it really fits well ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice and it really fits well in the overhead. Battery charger I needed to add but, the built in cable charger is very handy. A bit worried now that a battery charger caught fire in the overhead and they could band the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Olson

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag that I got for my wife. She loves it. Went to France for 6 days using it. Great value in a 21 inch carry on category and wheels through the airport easily
customer_reviews.author: Zappem

customer_reviews.title: I swear this is the best suitcase I've ever owned or experienced
customer_reviews.text: I swear this is the best suitcase I've ever owned or experienced. It makes walking through airports and parking lots so much more of a pleasure. I'll never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Carry On's
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought Samsonite in the past but decided to mix it up a little and very glad I did. An excellent piece of luggage and the laptop pouch is top class, makes it so much easier to remove for airport security. Charging socket is also a bonus and as you have to supply your own battery it is not built in like some other cases which are now not being allowed in the cabins of most airlines. Basically, extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this piece of Luggage
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were right. This is a good carry-on. It was actually roomier than expected. Wheels rolled smooth. Not heavy at all. The pockets are useful and well placed. Sturdy. Good purchase. Not sure you can go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Daynon Hohm

customer_reviews.title: Travelpro Luggage Crew 11 21" Carry-on
customer_reviews.text: This Travelpro luggage is very well made! I love all the little details and I can tell it will serve me for a long time. I would definitely consider buying more products form Travelpro. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mili

customer_reviews.title: NOT 21”, too tall for int’l flights
customer_reviews.text: Low rating due to false description as a 21” bag appropriate for international carriers. It’s not and had to be returned. Bag is just over 22” tall and baggage fees will be incurred on most international flights. Otherwise seemed sturdy and well-built.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the pilots use. You have to buy your own charger pack, fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ender

customer_reviews.title: Quality???? Not so sure
customer_reviews.text: Ok I used this luggage one(1) time and a wheel is wobbling. I’m so sure about the quality of this unit. The convenience and storage capacity is great. Love the USB port. Not sure about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyConsumer

customer_reviews.title: The Bag Is Covered by Warranty, The Garment "Sleeve" Is Not
customer_reviews.text: Despite Travelpro's advertising a "Built For A Lifetime Limited Warranty" with statements like "you're 100% covered", they consider the included garment "sleeve" as an "accessory", and therefore not covered. The "sleeve" that came packaged within my bag had a faulty zipper, and I was told it wasn't covered by the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hamm

customer_reviews.title: This is a super nice carry on
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice carry on. It is amazing what you can fit in there. The quality is top notch. Exactly what you can expect from a great brand such as TravelPro. If you need a new carry-on, you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Travel for business at least one round trip a week +, fits perfect in all 3 seat overhead bins, longest lasting luggage so far, wheels are awesome, good color / style.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and engineered
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed, thought out, engineered and rolls beautifully. I place my duffle bag on top and both my wife and myself each have a carry on and the other person has free hands.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: High quality suitcase! I was looking for a suitcase for my husband where he could pack his suit in the bag but not have to check it in. This very spacious yet compact suitcase fit the bill! We ordered it in brown with the light blue interior. I was very impressed with the high quality zippers, material and how easy it rolled. The wheels on the suitcase are very high quality and the suitcase is very durable. Highly recommend this stylish, high quality, compact suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: afadrow

customer_reviews.title: The best carry on
customer_reviews.text: The best carry on bag that I have ever owned period. Light, well built. Great features. Most of all it rolls great !
customer_reviews.author: Surf Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality carry on luggage. This is worth the extra money for the casual/occasional traveler.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great for worldwide travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 2 week Euro vacation and could not be happier. Plenty of space and wheels on surfaces better than any rollaboard I’ve ever had. Any surface. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bag, so easy to roll! The bag makes travel easier! Great looking also! So pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: The color is perfect (blue), and the brown trim shows up well ...
customer_reviews.text: The airline returned my spinner missing 2 wheels and this was purchased while on the road. The color is perfect (blue), and the brown trim shows up well on carousel.
customer_reviews.author: Terry McKegney

customer_reviews.title: Small inside compartment
customer_reviews.text: It is just too small in the inside. I love travel pro but this one is too small with with swivel wheels
customer_reviews.author: estorms146

customer_reviews.title: I like the bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag. Has a lot of nice features and the wheels are really smooth and track well. Not quite as ruggedly constructed as I would have thought given the way it's advertised but I don't plan to check it very much so durability may not be all that important. Also would have been nice to have an advisory on the charging station or in other words, a cool feature but only if the airline allows it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Mecum

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!  Not Free refund as stated
customer_reviews.text: When the suitcase arrived, it was smaller than I need. To get a refund OR exchange, $50 was deducted from the price I paid!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri C.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this and he travels all of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room and he uses it for all of his business travels.
customer_reviews.author: Lake House Granny

customer_reviews.title: Great BAG!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use and a great travel bag for breezing through the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Tee D Gee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice carry on! At 60 I needed something easy, this fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Tommi M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Well designed for the price. Traveled two weeks international with this and love it. Plenty of room and perfectly placed compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry on luggage.
customer_reviews.text: This carry on is lightweight and designed to let you pack in more stuff than you would think possible. It moves smoothly and efficiently. I like the adjustable handle--it works for well for both the short and tall people in my family. It is attractive and tasteful. It costs more than other carry on bags, but it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Broke after few times of use and warranty does not cover
customer_reviews.text: Wheel Broke after few times of use and warranty does not cover. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: IR

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this. No complaints and considering getting a full sized case for checked baggage from TravelPro.
customer_reviews.author: Some Dim Light

customer_reviews.title: Travelpro is our favorite luggage and this one is well made and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Travelpro is our favorite luggage and this one is well made and a cool color so it stands out from all the black bags
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Savvy carry on suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Her words- love the extra pocket charge cable feature. Love the wheels go every which way. Love the extra tall handle. Hanging clothes bag keeps clothes wrinkle free. Seems very roomy for a carry on suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: BillTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fits overhead and rolls easily
customer_reviews.text: Like all modern luggage, unnecessarily expensive, however, a very good design that fits well in overhead compartments and does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: liveaudio

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: What a great bag! The wheels are smooth, the compartments are handy, and it looks classy too. The tiniest downside is that it’s heavy, but that’s what makes it sturdy, so no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Divya Mirchandani

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment. Bad quality and worse service!!! Stay away from the brand
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and during my first trip wheel broke off, things can happen.... But when I went to a service centre to have it fixed (I thought under warranty as I just had bought it) they just laughed at me and said happy to fix it for your for 50 dollars!!! I said: What??? It is brand new, how can a wheel break??? Then I though, ok, may be I can fix it myself... abd asked them to explain to me how to change the wheel and they said no, never do it, otherwise I would not be able to charge you 50 dollars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar A. Avalle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag for someone that travels all the time. Fits in overhead and rolls nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Love the garment bag. Love the charging port (external battery not included, cable is).
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: nice travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Its a sturdy travel bag. The wheels are great-the bag never flips. But the bag doesn't come with a battery pack just the port. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Travelpro Crew 11-Softside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels, Black, Carry-On 21-Inch
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Travelpro Crew 11 21" Expandable Spinner Carry-On Suiter Suitcase is the civilian version of the famous traveler's bag that professional flight crews have depended on for decades the world over. Includes an external USB port for powering up any USB-powered device from the dedicated charger pocket that makes searching for an open wall outlet a thing of the past (portable charger/power pack not included). Constructed of high-quality ballistic nylon with a DuraGuard coating for stain and scratch resistance. With our PrecisionGlide System you have precise control and effortless roll with 3 patented features. The Patented Contour Grip has cushioned touch points that help relieve stress on your hand for more comfort and greater control of your spinner luggage. The Patented PowerScope Extension Handle reduces wobbling and features stops at 38", 40" and 42.5" lengths. The Patented MagnaTrac self-aligning wheels allows your luggage to roll smoothly in any direction without drifting. Smart packing is easy and secure in this durable suitcase that expands two extra inches and offers a deluxe suiter to help keep suits, dresses, and dress shirts wrinkle-free during transport, adjustable hold-down straps, a full-length interior lid pocket, wet pocket and damage-resistant SUPRA Zipper heads. This Fit to Fly carry-on spinner has been sizer been tested to accommodate overhead bin space on most major US airlines. Fully expanded Carry-On may not meet airline restrictions. Backed by our built for a lifetime limited worry free warranty that covers the cost of repair for damage from airline or other common carrier for the first 3 years after registration under the trusted companion promise.Self-aligning magnetic wheels that roll straight in any direction, let you fly through airports with ease.
feature_bullets: Travel with the same carry on innovations professional flight crews use including an external USB port for recharging any USB device from the dedicated charger pocket. Battery pack is not included

8 self aligning magnetic 360 degree dual spinner wheels for smooth, straight rolling without drifting and a PowerScope extension handle to minimize wobbling with stops at 38 inches, 40 inches and 42.5 inches

Backed by our built for a lifetime limited worry free warranty that covers the cost of repair for damage from airline or other common carrier for the first 3 years after registration under the trusted companion promise
Case Dimensions: 21 x 14 (can expand an extra 2”) x 9; Overall Dimensions: 23.5x14.5x9.5, Weight 7.2 pounds ; Volume: 46 litre

High quality ballistic nylon construction, a stain and scratch resistant DuraGuard coating and damage resistant Supra zipper heads for long lasting durability. Premium leather low profile top and side carry handles, full length interior lid pocket, side mesh, wet pockets, adjustable straps, removable hanging garment bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars506 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
